blogPost.excerpt: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
blogPost.body: Yada is an all-in-one solution that allows you to brainstorm, edit, and present your ideas. Start by writing your document & choose how to present your content with views. Iterate on the content or views in any order & at any time. Everything stays up to date.
blogPost.title: Yada - Never rewrite anything again
blogPost.author: Akshay Pall

localize.description: Yada是一个集头脑风暴、编辑和展示你的想法于一身的解决方案。从编写你的文档开始，选择如何呈现你的内容与视图。以任何顺序和任何时间对内容或视图进行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重写任何东西了

localize.description: Yada是一個集頭腦風暴、編輯和展示你的想法於一身的解決方案。從編寫你的文檔開始，選擇如何呈現你的內容與視圖。以任何順序和任何時間對內容或視圖進行迭代。一切都保持最新。
localize.tagline: 再也不重寫任何東西了

next.excerpt: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
next.title: Finley - Put your debt capital management on autopilot

localize.description: Finley简化了债务资本筹集和管理。我们的软件帮助成长中的公司自动进行尽职调查，确保合规性，并简化与资本提供者的持续报告。
localize.tagline: 让您的债务资本管理进入自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Finley簡化了債務資本籌集和管理。我們的軟件幫助成長中的公司自動進行盡職調查，確保合規性，並簡化與資本提供者的持續報告。
localize.tagline: 讓您的債務資本管理進入自動駕駛狀態
